name: Device has low capacity left or is full
description: Detects disk low capacity problems to give an early prediction for a possible capacity breach up to 15 minutes in advance. The detector is not firing when the remaining disk space is more than 1GB or 1% of the total capacity. However, it will fire if either the remaining disk space is empty (<1MB), or the disk space would fill up within the next 15 minutes based on the current trend.

fields.name: content
fields.value:
a. Check the device's available disk space and free up any unnecessary files or applications.
   b. If the issue persists, consider increasing the disk space by adding an external drive or upgrading the existing one.
   c. Monitor the device's usage over time to identify patterns that may indicate potential future capacity issues.

By following these steps, you can help ensure your device has sufficient capacity to operate smoothly and prevent potential data loss or corruption.
